name: Maryam Usman
title: Nutrition and Dietetics Tutor

education.institution: Gombe State College of Health Sciences and Technology

bio: Maryam Usman is a passionate Nutrition and Dietetics tutor dedicated to improving community health through balanced diets and lifestyle awareness. She trains students to understand the science of nutrition and its impact on disease prevention and maternal health.

testimonials.name: Halima Yusuf
testimonials.comment: Maryam has a calm teaching style that motivates us to apply nutrition science in daily life.
